answers.answer: was on it for i week felt good...then it botherd me made me feel weird so i stopped taking it...just take a multi and b6 b12 so far so good...dee

Ltyrosine can helps with energy and depression. The B6 helps in absorb and cross the blood brain barrier. It should not be taken with SSRI Tricyclic or MAO anti depressants or by people with diabetes, high blood pressure. A safe dose is 1500mgs 3x per day, but in severe cases can be taken up to 2500mgs 3x per day. It can increase blood pressure and also cause loose stools.

question: I managed my way to the health food store and bought some L-Tyrosine and b-6.. Does anyone else take this? has it helped? I took 2 of the L-Tyrosine. share some info on this please.des
title: L-Tyrosine anyone on it?
